name: find_palindromic_substrings_by_expand_around_center
description: Helper function to expand around a center for finding palindromic substrings. This function takes a string and two indices (left and right) as the center, and expands outwards to find the longest palindromic substring centered at the given indices.

s.description: The input string in which to find palindromic substrings.

left.description: The left index of the center from which to start expanding.

right.description: The right index of the center from which to start expanding.
